abstract: The Universal Music Group has named Evan Lamberg the president of its publishing unit in North America.
snippet: The Universal Music Group has named Evan Lamberg the president of its publishing unit in North America.
lead_paragraph: The Universal Music Group has named Evan Lamberg the president of its publishing unit in North America, the company announced on Thursday, in the latest in a series of management changes at the world's biggest music company.

headline.main: Evan Lamberg to Lead Universal Music Publishing
